# XmlProcessor

- **класс** `XmlProcessor` (`php\xml\XmlProcessor`) **унаследован от** `Processor` (`php\format\Processor`)
- **исходники** `php/xml/XmlProcessor.php`

**Описание**

Class XmlProcessor

---

#### Методы

- `->`[`format()`](#method-format)
- `->`[`formatTo()`](#method-formatto)
